item.description:
Join NHCer Josh at a Professional Networking Happy Hour.

The New Haven County Bar Association, Young Lawyers Section is hosting a Young Professional Networking Happy Hour at Heirloom Restaurant in The Study Hotel on Thursday, May 5, 2011.  The event is from 5:30 – 8:00.  This event is a great opportunity for young professionals from Connecticut to meet each other, share ideas, contacts and referrals.

Specials:

The Study will be providing free beer and wine for the 1st hour.

After that they will have an additional drink special TBD.

The Study is also providing free appetizers.

You may also want to remember to bring your Business Cards!

Josh is Hosing the Event and can be reached at 203-772-0070 if you have any questions.

 For Happy Hour type Events, please note in your RSVP section if you are only a "Maybe".
item.how_to_find_us: Josh is hosting this meetup and can be reached at 203-772-0070, several groups will be there to mingle with.
item.name: Young Professional Networking Happy Hour
